description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4nns7","text":"This protocol details how to efficiently monitor Clusterin and Clusterin/Substrate uptake in different cell types, like HEK293T, iNeurons and iMicroglia.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ef7qj","text":"To study Clusterin-A488 uptake in the presence of substrate, incubate   Clusterin-A488 with the corresponding amount of substrate, e.g. denatured Luciferase or Aβ aggregates, in PBS for   at   or   (denatured Luciferase) in a total volume of   or   in the case of HEK293T or iNeurons, respectively. After the incubation time dilute the mix 1/10 in media and add it to the cells resulting in a final concentration of   Clusterin-A488 ( ).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":186,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":191,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":196,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":242,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":247,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":416,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":434,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4u992","text":"To monitor substrate uptake e.g., denatured luciferase or Aβ aggregates, in the presence of Clusterin, mix   of denatured Luciferase-pHrodo or   of Aβ-pHrodo aggregates with the corresponding amount of unlabeled Clusterin in a total volume of   or   in the case of HEK293T or iNeurons, respectively. Dilute the mix 1/10 in media. pHrodo Red dye is pH sensitive dye which fluoresces brightly only in acidic environments and therefore can be used to specifically monitor phagocytosis and endocytosis, but substrates labeled with A488 can be also used.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":8,"offset":107,"length":1},{"key":9,"offset":143,"length":1},{"key":10,"offset":243,"length":1},{"key":11,"offset":248,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97lsb","text":"The indicated Clusterin-A488 or substrate concentrations and incubation times for each cell line are tentative. These parameters should be experimentally tested to be in the linear range of the assay.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","concentration":"1","duration":1200,"error":false,"error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B54E7BFBE9D11EE8E330A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","concentration":"1","duration":1200,"error":false,"error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B54E824BE9D11EE8E330A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":29}},"10":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","concentration":"1","duration":1200,"error":false,"error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B54E8B4BE9D11EE8E330A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":1}},"11":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","concentration":"1","duration":1200,"error":false,"error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B54E56CBE9D11EE8E330A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":1}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","concentration":"1","duration":1200,"error":false,"error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B54E5F5BE9D11EE8E330A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","concentration":"1","duration":1200,"error":false,"error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B54E921BE9D11EE8E330A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":
